<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Annotations lets you mark points and ranges inside source code, for tests:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Annotations Example(R&quot;cpp(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       int complete() &#123; x.pri^ &#125;         // ^ indicates a point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       void err() &#123; &#91;&#91;&quot;hello&quot; == 42&#93;&#93;; &#125; // &#91;&#91;this is a range&#93;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       $definition^class Foo&#123;&#125;;          // points can be named: &quot;definition&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       $(foo)^class Foo&#123;&#125;;               // ...or have a payload: &quot;foo&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       $definition(foo)^class Foo&#123;&#125;;     // ...or both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       $fail(runtime)&#91;&#91;assert(false)&#93;&#93;   // ranges can have names/payloads too</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    )cpp&quot;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    StringRef Code = Example.code();             // annotations stripped.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    std::vector&lt;size&#95;t&gt; PP = Example.points();   // all unnamed points</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    size&#95;t P = Example.point();                  // there must be exactly one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    llvm::Range R = Example.range(&quot;fail&quot;);       // find named ranges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Points/ranges are coordinated into &#96;code()&#96; which is stripped of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// annotations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Names consist of only alphanumeric characters or &#39;&#95;&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Payloads can contain any character expect &#39;(&#39; and &#39;)&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Ranges may be nested (and points can be inside ranges), but there&#39;s no way</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to define general overlapping ranges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// FIXME: the choice of the marking syntax makes it impossible to represent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        some of the C++ and Objective C constructs (including common ones</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        like C++ attributes). We can fix this by:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///          1 introducing an escaping mechanism for the special characters,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///          2 making characters for marking points and ranges configurable,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///          3 changing the syntax to something less commonly used,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///          4 ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/annotations"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/annotations/#a0ac05d465c3984a3a3fe146902cf3759">Annotations</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Two offsets pointing to a continuous substring. End is not included, i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// represents a half-open range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#ade0567803caf1669f42d474104c538b4"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#ade0567803caf1669f42d474104c538b4">Begin</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#aad3d015dd476bf919490962ee304b847"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#aad3d015dd476bf919490962ee304b847">End</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#a249ceeeb51200bcd8362f6e338218d9e"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#a249ceeeb51200bcd8362f6e338218d9e">operator==</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &amp;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &amp;R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#a54c67eb6c7f3bdb91ae65e72e5236cc6"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range/#a54c67eb6c7f3bdb91ae65e72e5236cc6">operator!=</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &amp;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/annotations/range">Range</a> &amp;R) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !(L == R); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
